data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: This picture describes a construction worker setting a banner on the stairs outside of a building. He wears a white safety helmet and squats on a platform that connects stairs outside of the building. I think he must be very tired as he is the only person working on this. People working in construction deserve more attention from the government because they are the people who build the infrastructure of a city. Therefore, it is essential that both the government and society continue to care for these people.
